message.body: Aw thanks babe. I miss you too- wish y'all could have stayed. Say a great show tonight I think you'd have loved. Xxxxoooo

Great!!!! Are you still thinking about the movie? Alice's dad is here and I might hang with them- but Katie g. said she was looking for a movie date if you're still thinking about it. Or we could go later?
Hey! Tried calling! The movie I wanted to see is no longer playing. Boo, so not sure. Could be convinced but if Doug is around would be more fun to hang
w him and you guys. Any plans?
Yea! I think I'll be hanging around here. You should do the same!!! Have a safe trip home...
Yeah that sounds good. Such a crazy and late night last night! I have a Phillip glass doc if u want to watch w me!
Oh yea! That would be great! Otherwise, we were talking about jimmying the tv to get the golden globes...
